GR14sadhdipu:4: many of which are incomplete. Some of the verses don't follow

GR14sadhdipu:7: I have used Haridas Shastri's edition,

GR14sadhdipu:9: be worth finding other manuscripts in order to produce a true critical edition.]

GR14sadhdipu:4240: puna premānanda jale tite se vasana /

GR14sadhdipu:4274: ekera apriya āre sambhāṣā nā kare //

GR14sadhdipu:4293: ei mata prabhu priya gadādhara saṅge /
GR14sadhdipu:4294: tān mukhe bhāgavata kathā śune raṅge //
GR14sadhdipu:4303: aśru kampa hāsya mūrcchā pulaka huṅkāra /
GR14sadhdipu:4308: śunile nā thāke bāhya nāce sei kṣaṇe //
GR14sadhdipu:4310: ye nā māne bhāgavata se yavana sama /
GR14sadhdipu:4311: tāra śāstā āche prabhu janme janme yama //
GR14sadhdipu:4313: sei rātri tathāha thāki tabe āra dine /
GR14sadhdipu:4314: gṛhe āilena prabhu lakṣmī devī sane //
GR14sadhdipu:4325: citte laya yadi tabe karaha sarvathā //
GR14sadhdipu:4328: tomāra kanyāra yogya sei divya pati /
GR14sadhdipu:4332: śuni vipra patnī ādi āpta-varga sahe /

GR14sadhdipu:4335: sarvathā e karma giyā karaha satvare //
GR14sadhdipu:4340: ye sukha pāilā tāhā ke pāre barṇite //

GR14sadhdipu:6252: vaiṣṇavaṃ jñāna-vaktāraṃ yo vidyād viṣṇuvad gurum /
GR14sadhdipu:6253: pūjayed vāṅ-manaḥ-kāyaiḥ sa śāstrajñaḥ sa vaiṣṇavaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6254: śloka-pādasya vaktāpi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa sadaiva hi /
GR14sadhdipu:6255: kiṃ punar bhagavad-viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ vitanoti yaḥ // ity ādi /
GR14sadhdipu:6263: madhu-lobhād yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpāntaraṃ vrajet /
GR14sadhdipu:6264: jñāna-lobhāt tathā śiṣyo guror gurv-antaraṃ vrajet //
GR14sadhdipu:6267: yuva-dvandvaṃ tac cet paricartium ārād abhilaṣeḥ /
GR14sadhdipu:6268: svarūpaṃ śrī-rūpaṃ sa-gaṇam iha tasyāgrajam api
GR14sadhdipu:6269: sphuṭaṃ premṇā nityaṃ smara nama tadā tvaṃ śṛṇu manaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6277: ata etādṛśānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-nandanandanasya tathāvidha-svarūpa-prāptir na
GR14sadhdipu:6278: bhavati tatrāpi śrī-rūpānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-rādhā-kṛṣṇātula-bhajana-ratnaṃ na
GR14sadhdipu:6282: ācinoti yaḥ śāstrārthān svācāraiḥ sthāpayaty api /
GR14sadhdipu:6283: svayam ācarate yasmāt tasmād ācārya ucyate //
GR14sadhdipu:6290: na japo nārcanaṃ naiva dhyānaṃ nāpi vidhi-kramaḥ /
GR14sadhdipu:6293: nāyikānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ madhyā śreṣṭhatamā matā /
GR14sadhdipu:6294: prāyaḥ sarva-rasotkarṣo madhyāyām eva yujyate // ity ādi /
GR14sadhdipu:6298: na dātavyā na prakāśyā jane tv anadhikāriṇi //
GR14sadhdipu:6300: māṃ ca gopaya yena syāt sṛṣṭir eṣottarottarā / iti /
GR14sadhdipu:6309: [*ENDNOTE 2] viśākhe / idam api alpam etat tat śṛṇu /
GR14sadhdipu:6312: vayasyasya sakala-gokula-patitvena govindābhiṣeka-mahotsavaḥ kasya vā garvaṃ na
GR14sadhdipu:6314: [*ENDNOTE 3] The actual lines from Mukundāṣṭakam are priyam iva kila
GR14sadhdipu:6315: varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ praṇayatu mama netrābhīṣṭa-pūrtiṃ mukundaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6316: [*ENDNOTE 4] These are two lines of a śārdūla-vikrīḍita verse. The rest is not
GR14sadhdipu:6317: found in the text. The source of these verses is unknown at this time.
GR14sadhdipu:6323: [*ENDNOTE 10] The readings on these verses are at quite great variance from the
GR14sadhdipu:6324: edition of Bṛhad-bhāgavatāmṛtam I have in my possession.

GR14sadhdipu:6328: [*ENDNOTE 12] This verse is not found in BhaktiS. Padma-purāṇa 5.82.8.
